description: The ultimate all-terrain vehicle, the Terra Fi 5 Universal ups the ante with a fresh silhouette that’s lighter than ever before. Tailored for life’s detours, this quick-drying silhouette offers a molded PU midsole, ultra-grippy rubber outsole, and hook-and-loop closure to get you in and out in a flash.
name: Teva Terra Fi 5 Universal - Mens
